intro: Clymenum dolichoides, commonly known as the slender clymenia, is a flowering plant native to certain regions of Africa. It belongs to the family Rubiaceae, which includes many shrubs and herbs. The plant is characterized by its slender stems and small, white or pale yellow flowers. It typically grows in moist, shaded environments such as forest understories. Clymenum dolichoides is often found in association with other understory plants in tropical and subtropical regions.
